tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CarePlans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    plan_description TEXT,
    treatment_history JSON,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE telecardiology_patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    treatment_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE care_plans (
    care_plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES telecardiology_patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE care_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients(
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments(
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  physician VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE CarePlans(
  careplan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_id UUID REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id),
  plan_description TEXT,
  created_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Telecardiology(
  telecardiology_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id UUID,
  consultation_date DATE,
  consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthMeasurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
  heart_rate INT,
  weight DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  dosage VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CarePlans (
  care_plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  instructions TEXT
);
